name: 2008 YouTube Theme for BitView (with red player!)
description:
Some simple yet powerful features that makes your BitView experience even more nostalgic. From now, I've changed:

- 2008 YouTube Broadcast Yourself Logo
- 2008 YouTube Small Logo in channels
- Changed teal colors on player to YouTube's red ones
- Teal colored text is now black, like on YouTube

user.name: Herotrap
user.about: Don't have too much to say.

additional_info:
Release note (Version 1.01), November 11th 2020
- Fixed red player on channels and embed.

Release note (Version 1.02), November 11th 2020
- Added YouTube logo on embedded videos.
